籤詩版本二:
Uma umnyakazo womdlali we-chess ufanelekile, umdlalo omnyama nomhlophe awunqunyelwe.
Sonke siyazi ukunqoba noma ukunqotshwa ngenxa yomnyakazo owodwa. Sidinga ukuzifundisa ukwenza izincomo ezinhle.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokuhlangana nomphikisi.
Kuhle ukusebenzisa izitho kukho konke.
解曰: Izifiso nemicabango. Njengoba nje Go. Ukunqoba ekugcineni. Kunconywa ukusebenzisa ubuqili.
籤詩故事一:
◇Uhlu lwempi lukaJiang Wei noDeng Ai
Ngesikhathi seMibuso Emithathu, i-Jiang Wei (Shu) kanye ne-Deng Ai (Wei)
Amabutho womabili ahlangana eQishan alwa yodwa. Womabili amabutho e-Wei kanye ne-Shu abhekana nesitha ekubunjweni kwe-Bagua. Lapho amabutho amabili elwa, u-Jiang Wei waphakamisa ifulege lakhe futhi wamemeza, futhi ukwakheka kwe-Bagua kwashintsha ngaso leso sikhathi ukwakheka komhlabathi okude okugoqa izinyoka, kuvava uDeng Ai. Kamuva wahlengwa nguSima Wang.
(Ngomfanekiso, lapho ubhekene nesimo esibucayi, kufanele usebenzise ukuhlakanipha.)
聖意: Umndeni nomuzi uzinzile, umuntu uzinzile, ibhizinisi liyaphumelela, umshado awubuyiselwa, owesifazane ohamba ngezinyawo eLiujia uvimba inkundla, izikelemu zesilika nemfuyo yonakala, ukuseshwa kuvinjiwe, icala lifanelekile futhi ukufuduka. liyalondoloza, impahla elahlekile ayinalutho, isifo sithandazela ukuvikelwa, ithuna lasezintabeni liyalondoloza
古人: UJiang Wei noDeng Ai balwa impi
